result.eng: He loves playing with his ball.
result.ga: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróid
result.orig: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróid
result.html: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróidHe loves playing with his ball.
result.ponchtml: Is breá leis imirt lena liaṫróidHe loves playing with his ball.

result.eng: The owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ga: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.orig: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.html: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ an t-úinéir buíoċas lena ḟoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.

result.eng: He likes playing with his toys.
result.ga: Is maith leis súgradh lena chuid bréagán
result.orig: Is maith leis súgradh lena chuid bréagán
result.html: Is maith leis súgradh lena chuid bréagánHe likes playing with his toys.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ leis súgraḋ lena ċuid bréagánHe likes playing with his toys.

result.eng: You were so alike when you were little!
result.ga: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.orig: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beag
result.html: Bhí sibh chomh cosúil lena chéile nuair a bhí sibh beagYou were so alike when you were little!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siḃ ċoṁ cosúil lena ċéile nuair a ḃí siḃ beagYou were so alike when you were little!

result.eng: We believe it for a reason.
result.html: Tá údar againn lena chreidiúintWe believe it for a reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá údar againn lena ċreidiúintWe believe it for a reason.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.html: Tháinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.

result.html: Cuireann sé uisce lena fhiaclaIt makes his mouth water.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé uisce lena ḟiaclaIt makes his mouth water.

result.eng: Their mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ga: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.orig: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.html: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena ḃfiacla ar ṁéad is a ḃí d'ocras orṫuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.

result.eng: She had fallen out with her mother.
result.ga: Bhí sí tar éis titim amach lena máthair
result.orig: Bhí sí tar éis titim amach lena máthair
result.html: Bhí sí tar éis titim amach lena máthairShe had fallen out with her mother.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí tar éis titim amaċ lena máṫairShe had fallen out with her mother.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé lena ṁáṫair ar ġreim láiṁe go teaċ na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.eng: They were waiting for their turn.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.orig: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.html: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag feiṫeaṁ lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
